name: phonographically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that involves the recording of sounds using electronic equipment: Patients were asked to record their dreams phonographically rather than write them down. I found it fascinating to hear the phonographically captured voices of long dead authors and composers.
More examplesFewer examplesLord Tennyson was one one of the first major poets to be phonographically recorded.Making notes in this way could never be a phonographically exact method.Hearing one of the first phonographically recorded voices had a profound effect on her.
